articles.title: New research shows brain grey matter loss after Covid-19 infection - Business Standard
articles.description: The researchers affiliated with the University of Oxford posted findings ahead of peer review to medRxiv, drawing on data from the UK Biobank.
articles.content:
An analysis of brain scans from people once infected with Covid-19 suggest a consistent pattern in loss of grey matter over time, say researchers.
